a garden plant with groups of small white, red, or purple flowers: Many of the hardy annuals such as candytuft can be sown directly. Nectar-rich plants such as candytuft, clematis, poppies, sweet peas, salvias, and violets provide bumblebees with essential fuel.
More examplesFewer examplesFlowers like snapdragons, sweet peas, marigolds, and candytuft make a bright show during the summer months and cost next to nothing. Grow hardy annuals such as candytuft in a sunny border.Flowers such as saxifrages, dwarf rhododendrons, campanulas, and candytuft give a delightful range of flower shape and plant form.
